title: IRibFeatureData2.IsTwoSided
description: Gets or sets whether the rib is created on two sides of the midplane or in a single direction (see IRibFeatureData2::ReverseThicknessDir).
returns: True if the rib is extruded either side of the midplane, false if it is single-sided
remarks:
Changing the value of this property does not affect geometry until
IFeature::ModifyDefinition
or
IFeature::IModifyDefinition2
is called.
